features: [ENDLESS COMBINATIONS AND CREATIVITY, LIMITLESS FUN] All parts of the flower building toy set are interchangeable, easy to fit together and easy to take apart. Kids can mix and stack pieces together to make different flowers, such as lilies, chrysanthemums, plum blossoms, orchids, petunias, or any imaginary flowers. The bases also can be combined in many ways. The flower garden building toys allow kids to build their unique garden world. Cool toys for 3 4 5 6 7 year old girl gifts.

[TOYS FOR KIDS INDOOR AND OUTDOOR] The flower building toy set contains more than 10 bright colors that can attract children's attention and keep them quiet for hours. Toys for 3 year old girls, kids will love to play this flower garden toy themself or share it with their siblings, friends. Kids like the little watering can to pretend to water their garden. The build a garden toy suits for kids playing in any season and places, such as in the living room, in the bath, on the beach, in the park.

[EDUCATIONAL BUILDING TOYS, DEVELOP THE COMPREHENSIVE ABILITY FOR KIDS] Parents or teachers can use this flower garden toy to teach kids the parts of flowers. Kids can learn how to plant and water flowers. The flower garden building toys help children with color recognition and counting, while inspire their imagination and creativity, promote hand-eye coordination, fine motor skills, logical thinking ability. It is good for cultivating a more intimate parent-child relationship.

[SMART SET, PERFECT GIFT] The flower building toy set comes with 51 flower pieces, 43 stamens, 12 green bases, 50 leaf pieces, 24 stems, 3 small flower pots, 6 receptacles, 1 small watering can, 1 toy shovel, 10 butterflies. A nice cloth drawstring bag is convenient for kids to store all the pieces to prevent loss and carry anywhere. Flower garden building toys are best gift for girls and boys for birthday, children's day, Christmas, New Year.

[CHILD-SAFE MATERIALS, SATISFACTION GUARANTEE] The flower building toy is made of durable plastic, Eco-friendly, BPA-free. They passed through CPSIA ASTM testing. Smooth surface is comfortable to touch and easy to clean. Toys for 3 year old girls, flower garden building toys are suitable for kids of a wide range of age groups. Recommended for girls or boys age 3+. Just contact us if you are not satisfied with the product and we will offer you fast customer-Service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: LANNEY flower garden building toy is perfect gift for girls and boys in birthday, children's day, Christmas, New Year. The flower building toy set comes with 51 flower pieces (petals, pistils), 43 stamens, 12 green bases, 50 leaf pieces, 24 stems, 3 small flower pots, 6 receptacles, 1 small watering can, 1 toy shovel, 10 butterflies. With this 200pcs flower building toy set, kids can enjoy endless fun while develop their comprehensive ability. All parts are interchangeable, easy for kids to stack, easy to disassemble and reassemble.Kids can mix pieces together to create endless combinations, exploring their creativity.Kids can combine the green bases in different ways to build their desired garden world.Flower garden building toys contain more than 10 vibrant colors that can keep kids preoccupied.Kids like the little watering can to water their flowers and imagine to be a little gardener.Flower pots, receptacles, butterflies, these accessories allow kids to DIY pot plants and decorate their garden.With toy shovel, children can build their own garden outside, like on the beach, sandbox, yard, lawn.Thanks to the complete set, kids will love to share it with their friends immerse in endless fun.Parents join the kids in building a garden, and have a pleasant family time together.

Flower garden building toys are great learning tool, to help kids learn about the structure and shape of flowers in a fun and creative way. It is also an educational toy which help parents and teachers to teach kids knowledge of colors and make them understand counting. Flower garden building toys potentially help children develop in science, technology, engineering, mathematics. Develop fine motor skills and hand-eye coordination. Inspire children’s creativity, imagination. Enhance attention focusing ability. Promotes kids' logical thinking ability. Increase kids' intelligence and confidence. Exercise co-operation skills.

The flower garden building toy is made of non-toxic plastic which is certified by Children's Product Testing, safe for kids to play. The flower building toy set also comes with a drawstring backpack bag that is convenient for storing all the pieces, or carrying out anywhere. The flower garden building toys can be used for craft decoration once finished. They are so easy to clean with water or wiped with damp cloth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this toy for kids and adults
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my 6 year old, but we all play with it! We ended up getting two sets which is more helpful with 3 kids. There is plenty for them to play with and share with 2 sets. I also secretly love playing with this! So many ways to design the flowers! Fun for creative pretend play, and even our 1 year old can build the flowers well. Some small pieces so beware for younger kids, but fun if they are watched carefully. Great for fine motor skills and creativity

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Engaging and Fun!
reviews.reviewText: What can I say? Your kids will pick playing with this over cartoons, tablets and fighting with their siblings, lol.I even found it fun! Additionally, pick up is quick and easy.You can create so many different patterns, and it has improved my nephews motor skills. He can name colors better, share better, and he just gets so excited when I take it out...Worth the money because it will make great memories!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My 2 year old loves these. She can play independently for 30-45 minutes with these. Perfect for family fun too with parents + kids. LOVE that it comes with a bag for easy storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A fun toy!
reviews.reviewText: Super fun you and provides lots of entertainment! My only complaint is the butterflies are cheap and fall apart the first time you play with them and that was disappointing for my girl.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent product! Excellent customer service!
reviews.reviewText: This is a fantastic product, that will give many years of play time. I had an issue with my first shipment, and customer service took care of it immediately! This is a wonderful company to deal with, and a terrific product. If I can give them more than five stars I would thank you thank you for this incredible flower garden and for the great customer service that you all provided. I will always be a customer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We have purchased this 3x now for gifts for kids 2-7 years old. It’s been a hit everytime. Cultivates creativity

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun and creative flower building toy
reviews.reviewText: My granddaughters love this flower building set. It makes a great gift especially for young girls.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great flower building
reviews.reviewText: 3 yr old granddaughter loves building & making the flowers. Loves pretty when built. Can build the flowers any way you want.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was a bit skeptical about this product, but that soon changed when we received it. My daughter who is 2 years 4 months is obsessed with it. She makes lovely little flowers and even colour sorts too. The quality is amazing. It has a green bag to store it away for ease. My only criticism is it doesn’t come in bags, it’s all chucked in the box but that’s no issue. Very easy for children to learn what to do. I also became addicted to playing with it 😂 the photos show only some of the flowers and stems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble and you can create lots of different flower arrangements. Good quality and lovely bright colours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great product with lots of fun not only for kids. We bought 3 more for friends as everyone enjoyed playing with it so much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this a s a present for my 3 year Granddaughter. She loves it. Only issue is the clips on the butterflies fall off easily but can be rectified with a bit of glue

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My toddler loves this! So many different bits and combinations
